newsitem.title: USA: PSE to list Bell Microproducts options.
newsitem.headline: PSE to list Bell Microproducts options.

text.p: The Pacific Stock Exchange (PSE) said on Wednesday it will begin trading options on Bell Microproducts Inc on November 21.
The PSE said the options would open with strike prices of 5, 7-1/2 and 10 and will be available for the months of December, January, March and June.
Microproducts shares were down 11/16 at 7-3/8 in early afternoon trade.
The options are allocated to lead market makers Paul Mandell and William Brandreth of Susquehanna Investment Group, it said. --Derivatives desk, 312 408-8750/Email: derivatives@reuters.com
